user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend, and I want to make it extra special. Can you provide me with a random fact about the day of the year, June 21st, to include in the party decorations? Also, I need some inspiration for party games, so please fetch a random chuck joke in JSON format.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random fact about June 21st to use in the party decorations.
Fetch a random Chuck joke in JSON format for party inspiration.
